name: Spinal Tapper
description:
Tap your way into the halls of Valhalla!

Have you ever wanted to be a rock star, but lacked the voice to sing, or the opposable thumbs to drum, or rhythm, in general? Now you can get a taste of heavy metal stardom. Rock hard! Rise up! Sell out!

• Customize your own band with 50 musicians
• Go from the basement to the heavens playing at 6 different venues
• Use abilities to rock harder and sell out faster
